translation.start: Welcome to the faceit stats bot! You are now able to add players to your list.
translation.welcomeBack: Welcome back! Your team: {{ players }}. You can check stats or modify your team.

resetTeam.success: Team has been successfully reset. Now you don't have any players. You can add some via the button .
resetTeam.notExists: You don't have a team to reset. Init it first via the command '/start.'

translation.basicMenu: Your team: {{ teamNicknames }}. Choose one of the options:
translation.doneSelectOneOfTheOptions: Done! Select one of the options:
translation.sendLastMatchesCount: Send the number of last matches you want to see.
translation.sendPlayerNickname: Send player nickname you want to check:
translation.choosePlayer: Choose a player nickname you want to check:

addPlayer.inProgress: Adding player {{ nickname }} to your team. Please wait...
addPlayer.progressLevel: Adding player {{ nickname }}. Downloading matches: {{ percentage }} %.
addPlayer.success: Player {{ nickname }} was added. Your team: {{ teamNicknames }}.
addPlayer.sendNickname: Send nickname of the player you want to add.
addPlayer.exists: Sorry, but player {{ nickname }} already exists in your team. Try to add another player. Your team: {{ teamNicknames }}.
addPlayer.notExists: Sorry, but player {{ nickname }} doesn't exist. Try to add another player.
addPlayer.maxPlayersAmount: Sorry, but you can't add more players. Try to delete the existing one to add a new one. Your team: {{ teamNicknames }}.

deletePlayer.success: Player {{ nickname }} was deleted. Your team: {{ teamNicknames }}.
deletePlayer.notExists: Sorry, but {{ nickname }} doesn't exists in your team.
deletePlayer.select: Your team: {{ teamNicknames }}. Choose a player you want to delete:
deletePlayer.lastWasDeleted: You just deleted the last player in your team. Please add at least one player via the button below.

updatePlayers.success: Team players was successfully updated. Check out Elo rating via the /get_team_elo or K/D via /get_team_kd commands.
updatePlayers.error: Unfortunately, dut to the technical reasons it is impossible to update players right now. Please wait and try again later.

getTeamKD.chooseLastMatchesAmount: Choose the number of last matches you want to see:
getTeamKD.validationError: Bad value error: Your input must be an integer number greater than 0.

highestElo.default_one: {{ nickname }}'s highest elo rating was {{ highestElo }} ({{ diffElo }} from now). Date when the highest elo rating was reached: {{ highestEloDate }} ({{ count }} day ago).
highestElo.default_other: {{ nickname }}'s highest elo rating was {{ highestElo }} ({{ diffElo }} from now). Date when the highest elo rating was reached: {{ highestEloDate }} ({{ count }} days ago).
highestElo.peakElo_one: {{ nickname }} is at its peak now! Current elo rating: {{ highestElo }}. Date when the highest elo rating was reached: {{ highestEloDate }} ({{ count }} day ago).
highestElo.peakElo_other: {{ nickname }} is at its peak now! Current elo rating: {{ highestElo }}. Date when the highest elo rating was reached: {{ highestEloDate }} ({{ count }} days ago).

summaryStats.message_one: {{ teamNicknames }} has just completed a match. Above, you can find updated team statistics.
summaryStats.message_other: {{ teamNicknames }} have just completed a match. Above, you can find updated team statistics.
summaryStats.unsubscribed: You have been successfully unsubscribed from the summary stats.
summaryStats.subscribed: You have been successfully subscribed to the summary stats.

calculateBestMaps.message: Match {{ yourTeamName }} vs {{ opponentTeamName }} just created! Above, you can find the best maps for {{ yourTeamName }} ({{ teamNicknames }} from your team).
calculateBestMaps.unsubscribed: You have been successfully unsubscribed from the best maps calculation.
calculateBestMaps.subscribed: You have been successfully subscribed to the best maps calculation.

translation.teamNotExistError: You don't have a team. Init it first via the command '/start.'
translation.playerNotExistsError: Sorry, but player with nickname {{ nickname }} doesn't exists. Try to check another player.
translation.serverError: Oops, something went wrong. Try again later.

en.changedTo: Language was successfully changed to English.

errors.noPlayers: Sorry, but you need to have at least one player added to the team.
